# ==(_:_:)

**Operator**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two types are identical.

## Declaration

```swift
func == (t0: (any (~Copyable & ~Escapable).Type)?, t1: (any (~Copyable & ~Escapable).Type)?) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **t0**: A type to compare.
- **t1**: Another type to compare.

## Return Value

`true` if both `t0` and `t1` are `nil` or if they represent the same type; otherwise, `false`.

## Tuple Comparison

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the corresponding components of two tuples are equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether any corresponding components of the two tuples are not equal.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two types are not identical.
